title: Calculate Month Difference in Python
description: In this lab, you will learn how to calculate the month difference between two dates using the `datetime` module and the `math.ceil()` function in Python.

meta.title: Python Date Difference | Month Calculation
meta.description: Learn how to calculate the month difference between two dates in Python using the datetime module. Enhance your programming skills with this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, Date Difference, Month Calculation, Datetime Module, Programming Tutorial
